newsitem.title: INDIA: India Birla Mutual Fund board to meet on April 28.
newsitem.headline: India Birla Mutual Fund board to meet on April 28.

text.p: The board of directors of Birla Capital International AMC Ltd, investment manager for Birla Mutual Fund, will meet on April 28, its chief executive said.
The board meeting will finalise dividend on Birla Income Plus, Birla Capital's chief executive officer Ramamoorthy Ganesh said on Monday.
Birla Mutual Fund operates two schemes -- Birla Advantage Fund which invests predominantly in equities and Birla Income Plus which invests in debt market instruments.
Ganesh said assets managed by Birla Income Plus had crossed the 2.0 billion rupees mark. Birla Advantage Fund managed little over 1.0 billon rupees.
He said Birla Mutual had emerged as India's largest private sector open-ended mutual fund within two years of launch.
Birla Capital is a joint venture of the Aditya Birla Group and U.S. fund manager Capital International.
